Comes 2 yrs after the county Just Housing Ordinance spent months bouncing btw Board & Human Rights Commission on rulemaking

tweet_text:
Having read Better Buses Better Cities, these problems are obvious. There's investment in fancy capital like wifi but not in operating basics, like transit priority or improved frequencies. 

Who needs wifi when the bus ride is short?

The system is racist & ableist.
